'''Lillipup''' ([[List of Japanese Pokémon names|Japanese]]: '''ヨーテリー''' ''Yorterrie'') is a {{type|Normal}} {{OBP|Pokémon|species}} introduced in [[Generation V]].

It [[Evolution|evolves]] into {{p|Herdier}} starting at [[level]] 16, which evolves into {{p|Stoutland}} starting at level 32.

==Biology==
Lillipup is a light brown, canine Pokémon. It has oval, brown eyes, a red nose, and its face covered by an abundance of cream fur. This facial fur can be used for radar, and provides Lillipup with information about its surroundings. It has large pointed ears with a tuft of fur near the base of each. Its fur puffs out above its paws, and its back has a spiky dark blue blaze. Each paw has three toes, and a blue paw pad that can be seen in [[Pokédex 3D Pro]]. It has a short, tufty tail. It is an intelligent, courageous Pokémon capable of judging its opponent's strength.

==In the anime==
[[File:Lenora Lillipup.png|thumb|left|250px|Lillipup in the {{pkmn|anime}}]]
===Major appearances===
[[Lenora]]'s Lillipup debuted in ''[[BW015|The Battle According to Lenora!]]'', where it was used for {{Ash}}'s Gym battle. It was able to defeat [[Ash's Tepig]] during the match.

===Minor appearances===
Lillipup made cameo appearances in ''[[BW051|Lost at the Stamp Rally!]]'', ''[[BW052|Ash Versus the Champion!]]'', ''[[BW053|A Maractus Musical!]]'', ''[[BW057|The Mighty Accelguard to the Rescue!]]'', ''[[BW069|Climbing the Tower of Success!]]'', and ''[[BW083|Rocking the Virbank Gym! Part 1]]''.

A Lillipup appeared in ''[[M14|White—Victini and Zekrom and Black—Victini and Reshiram]]'', under the ownership of [[Luis]]. In the latter movie, it was helping Luis search for rare herbs frozen in the ice when it nearly fell into icy water after Luis lost his grip on it during a disaster in which a giant iceberg hit the glacier they were on; it was then rescued by [[Damon]]'s {{p|Gothitelle}}'s {{m|Confusion}}. In the former movie, it made a brief cameo appearance while fulfilling a similar role.

A Lillipup appeared in ''[[BW080|Clash of the Connoisseurs!]]'', where [[Mr. Hatterly]] thought it would be a good Pokémon for [[Marigold]]. However, {{an|Cilan}} disagreed, much to Marigold's relief.

Multiple Lillipup appeared in ''[[BW085|All for the Love of Meloetta!]]''.

Multiple Lillipup appeared in ''[[M15|Kyurem VS. The Sword of Justice]]'', during the {{OBP|Swords of Justice|M15}} legend.

A Lillipup appeared in a flashback in ''[[BW112|Team Plasma's Pokémon Power Plot!]]''.

A Lillipup appeared in a flashback in ''[[BW118|Secrets From Out of the Fog!]]''.

A Lillipup appeared in a fantasy in ''[[BW120|Ash and N: A Clash of Ideals!]]''.

A Lillipup appeared in ''[[BW127|The Island of Illusions!]]''.

A Lillipup appeared in ''[[BW134|The Journalist from Another Region!]].''

A {{pkmn|Trainer}}'s Lillipup appeared in ''[[XY066|Confronting the Darkness!]]''.

Two Trainers' Lillipup appeared in ''[[SM001|Alola to New Adventure!]]'', with one appearing in a flashback.

Two Trainers' Lillipup appeared in ''[[SM004|First Catch in Alola, Ketchum-Style!]]''.

Three Trainers' Lillipup appeared in ''[[SM006|A Shocking Grocery Run!]]''.

A Lillipup appeared in a photo in ''[[SM008|Lillie's Egg-xhilarating Challenge!]]'', ''[[SM027|A Glaring Rivalry!]]'', and ''[[SM048|Night of a Thousand Poses!]]'', in which it was held by a younger {{an|Lillie}} before she developed a fear of Pokémon.

A Trainer's Lillipup appeared in ''[[SM017|Crystal-Clear Sleuthing!]]''.

A Trainer's Lillipup appeared in ''[[SM021|One Journey Ends, Another Begins...]]''.

Three Trainers' Lillipup appeared in ''[[SM023|Getting the Band Back Together!]]''.

A Trainer's Lillipup appeared in ''[[SM027|A Glaring Rivalry!]]''.

Two Lillipup appeared in ''[[SM032|Treasure Hunt, Akala Style!]]''.

A Trainer's Lillipup appeared in [[SM060]].

==In the manga==
[[File:Lenora Lillipup Herdier Adventures.png|thumb|Lillipup (right) in [[Pokémon Adventures]]]]
===In the Pokémon Adventures manga===
A Trainer's Lilipup appeared in a flashback in ''[[PS464|Black's First Trainer Battle]]'' and ''[[PS471|Growing Pains]]''.

A Lillipup is one of the Pokémon employed by {{Adv|White}} in her [[BW Agency]]. Since the director asked for a Pokémon that can do stunts and Lillipup's silhouette showed up, Lillipup presumably is a stunt Pokémon for the Agency. It first appeared in ''[[PS465|Lights, Camera...Action]]''.

[[Lenora]] has a {{p|Stoutland}} which she owned since it was a Lillipup. It was seen in a flashback in ''[[PS474|Defeating Stoutland]]''.

==Trivia==
* Lillipup shares its {{pkmn|category}} with {{p|Growlithe}} and {{p|Rockruff}}. They are all known as the Puppy Pokémon.

===Origin===
Lillipup is based on a {{wp|Yorkshire terrier}}.

====Name origin====
Lillipup may be a combination of ''[[wiktionary:lilliputian|lilliputian]]'' and ''pup''.

Yorterrie may derive from ''{{wp|Yorkshire terrier}}''.
